summary: Fixes people attacking you at stage 4 vampirism.
descriptionHtml:
Description:  
I love being a fiend of the night but the one thing that annoyed me was being attacked as a stage 4 vampire.
This mod fixes the problem.  I have not tested it extensively but it seems to work for me. 
If you like this mod please endorse.  I am also taking mod suggestions so if you have an idea for a mod
feel free to private message me and I will see what I can do to help.  Keep in mind that I have college and work
so I may take a few hours to respond and creating the mod could take anywhere from a few minutes to a few days 
depending on how extensive the suggestion is.

Bugs/glitches:
If you find any bugs please report them in the comments section.  I will try to check it regularly.  If you find
something gamebreaking just private message me and I will probably react faster to fix the problem.  Please remember
that I am not a very experienced modder.  My knowledge is limited to playing around with the CK and some blender/nikscope
knowledge from doing some BBB animation conversions for a few armors/clothing.

Conflicts:  Chances are this mod will conflict with most mods that alter vampirism.  It should be fine as long as you
load my mod after the other vampire-altering mods.

Licensing/Legal:  Feel free to upload this mod to any site or modify it any way you wish.  All I ask is for a private
message stating what you are doing and to recievecredit as the original creator/author.
author: kridlekid
